name: Spot The Difference - PHOTO for PC
name_original: Spot The Difference - PHOTO for PC
description:
Find 5 differences between the two pictures in a limited time.
The answer changes every time you play!
Sometimes a fairy will help you if you have a hard time.
Fairies give life, time, hints, but they also bring bombs.
Try to clear all the stages while restoring your vitality through a mini-game.
